mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SM01M01 M SET STOCK_UPR = NVL((SELECT MAX(D.STOCK_UPR) FROM TB_SM01D01 D WHERE CLOSE_YM = #{closeYm} AND D.CO_CD = M.CO_CD AND D.WH_CD = M.WH_CD AND D.PRDT_CD = M.PRDT_CD AND D.OWNER_CD = M.OWNER_CD AND D.CLNT_CD = M.CLNT_CD AND D.TYP_CD = M.TYP_CD AND D.MAKR_CD = M.MAKR_CD AND D.PRJCT_CD = M.PRJCT_CD AND D.IMP_YN = M.IMP_YN AND NVL(D.PRDT_SIZE,'@') = NVL(M.PRDT_SIZE,'@') AND NVL(D.PRDT_SPEC,'@') = NVL(M.PRDT_SPEC,'@') AND NVL(D.PRDT_LEN ,0) = NVL(M.PRDT_LEN ,0) ),M.STOCK_UPR)
